<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tools of the Trade](/Feats.aspx?ID=1915) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 163 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Bounty Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=52)

**Prerequisites**
[Bounty Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1914)

</column>

---

You're well-versed in weapons that allow you to bring bounties in alive. You are trained with the following weapons: [bola](/Weapons.aspx?ID=123), [sap](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37), and [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48). You gain access to bolas. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the weapons listed.

 In addition, you take no penalty when making a nonlethal attack with a weapon without the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait.
name: Tools of the Trade
